titles.title: Equal Pay Improvement Report Act of 2003

To direct the Equal Employment Opportunity Commission to prepare a report about how the Fair Labor Standards Act of 1938 has been used by public and private sector employers to foster or exacerbate pay inequity.

bill.summary: 3/27/2003--Introduced. Equal Pay Improvement Report Act of 2003 - Directs the Equal Employment Opportunity Commission to report to Congress on how the Fair Labor Standards Act of 1938 has been used by public and private sector employers to foster or exacerbate pay inequity.
